message: I have a huge site to import - mainly attachments in the upload folder. The site is currently on wordpress own servers and im moving it to private hosting.
Fatal error: Out of memory (allocated 67108864) (tried to allocate 10368 bytes) in /home/chris/public_html/dev/SITENAME/wp-includes/media.php on line 254
Have you tried to migrate the database and files separately? Look for the WP Migrate Plugin.
